TopicSet.Comment: The current usability of a NewsItem.

Topic.Description: The NewsItem and its content may be published without restriction.
Neither the NewsItem nor its content may be published until released for publication by the provider.
Neither the NewsItem nor its content may be published until further notice.

Neither the NewsItem nor its content may be used under any circumstances. If the NewsItemor its content has been published the publisher must take immediate action to withdraw or retract it, as may be legally necessary.
